alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, west central Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Tallahassee to near Woodville to 9 miles southwest of Tallahassee Community College. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Newport, Cody, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Chaires, Bethel, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Natural Bridge and Springsax Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
